page.title: 03WALSALL TOWN CENTRE
page.content: {Shopping}facilities were improved in the 1960's with the{redevelopment}of {Digbeth}and{Townend Square}and the opening of Sainsburys,Debenhams,Boots and Littlewoods.{The Saddler Centre}is a recent major development on former railway land behind{Park St}which includes a large Marks and Spencer. Two new superstores have opened - Tesco on the site of the old{George {Hotel}on the{Bridge}and a new Sainsburys in{High St.} An{inner ring road}takes traffic out {of Park St}and{Digbeth}which are now pedestrianised. Several{cinemas}have closed - the Gaumont, Imperial (now a Bingo Hall), Empire and Palace, only the ABC in {Townend Square}remains. A new{Civic Centre}in{Darwall St}now houses most of the council offices.
